member.name: WS_CHARSET
member.summary: Identifies the character set of a document.

member.name: WS_CHARSET.WS_CHARSET_AUTO
member.summary: Specifies that the charset of a document should be determined automatically by inspecting the BOM (Byte Order Marks) of the document and the xml declaration if present.

member.name: WS_CHARSET.WS_CHARSET_UTF8
member.summary: Specifies that the charset of a document is UTF-8.

member.name: WS_CHARSET.WS_CHARSET_UTF16LE
member.summary: Specifies that the charset of a document is UTF-16LE.

member.name: WS_CHARSET.WS_CHARSET_UTF16BE
member.summary: Specifies that the charset of a document is UTF-16BE.
